name: Porygon
description: The Virtual Pokémon. The only Pokémon that people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: This Pokémon copies a random ability of an opponent when entering battle. The ability cannot be Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon can choose a different damage type for one of their normal attacks.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: After this Pokémon misses an attack, its next attack is done at advantage.
